alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Washington; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 4:20AM EST until March 03 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Washington, Southeast Aroostook, Northeast Aroostook, and Northwest Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Washington; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
